description.en:
1. Basic starting points and key concepts of media economics: economic basis of media organizations, principles of dualist market, competition, characteristics of oligopolistic market, fixed input and variable input in different media organizations, the theory of attention economy.
2. The transformation of media management in the era of new media and participatory culture: digital multisided media markets, theories and practices of peer-production, the construction of niche-auditoriums.
3. Media politics and power relations: critical understanding of globalizing media market, the influence of web giants, the logic of search engines, monetization of user-generated content, the invisibility of digital labour.
4. Social networking sites and (self-)branding: self-branding strategies of journalists, social media influencers, practices of native advertising/astroturfing and ethical challenges.
5. Setting up a media enterprise: business plan, business environment analysis, budgeting, risk assessment.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to introduce the basic concepts of media economics and to open contemporary theories of political economy of media and communication. Additional goal is to analyse the challenges of attention economy and to introduce various strategies that Estonian media companies have used for adapting with the transformations of contemporary media market. Apply basic knowledge of media economics to media entrepreneurship.
objectives.et: Tutvustada meediamajanduse põhimõisteid, avada tänapäevaseid poliitökonoomia teooriaid ning mõtestada tähelepanuturu väljakutseid ning võimalusi meedia- ja kommunikatsiooni ettevõtete jaoks, käsitleda eesti meediaturu eripära ja selle transformeerumist ühismeedia ajastul. Rakendada meediamajanduse alusteadmisi meediaettevõtluse harjutamisel.

learning_outcomes.en: After passing the course the student:
- has an overview of key terminology of media economics and an experience of applying the concepts in analysis of particular media phenomena;
learning_outcomes.et: - omab ülevaadet meediamajanduse baasterminoloogiast ning oskab seda konkreetsetes analüüsides rakendada;

learning_outcomes.en: - has a basic knowledge about the main factors of attention economy and s/he understands the main mechanisms and interrelations of media economics and media politics;
learning_outcomes.et: - omab baasteadmisi tänapäevase tähelepanuturu võtmeteguritest ning mõistab meediapoliitika ja meediamajanduse toimemehhanismide seoseid;

learning_outcomes.en: - can independently find relevant academic sources and critically analyse them.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab iseseisvalt leida asjakohaseid akadeemilisi allikaid ning neid kriitiliselt analüüsida.

learning_outcomes.en: - has taken the necessary steps to establish the enterprise, taking into account the social and regulatory context of the media business.
learning_outcomes.et: - on teinud läbi ettevõtte loomiseks vajalikud sammud, võttes arvesse meediaäri ühiskondlikku ja regulatiivset konteksti.

Töö toetab meediaettevõtte arendusplaani tegemist, sest selgitab antud hetke meediaturu olukorda.
Meediaettevõtte arendusplaan ja selle tutvustus seminaris
